com.thalesgroup.gemalto.cas

Class CasClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thalesgroup.gemalto.cas.CasClient

  • public class CasClient
extends Object
    A class that constructs the CasClient to communicate with the CAS Server. The class helps to implement E2EE password encryption, supports creating encrypted payload for users when performs operations such as setting or changing the user password or authenticating with the user password.
    Since:
    6.1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CasClient(EncryptionVersion encryptionVersion, String publicKey)
      Initialize an instance of the CasClient.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CasClient

        public CasClient(EncryptionVersion encryptionVersion,
                 String publicKey)
        Initialize an instance of the CasClient.
        Parameters:
        encryptionVersion - The CAS encryption version to use according to the CAS specifications.
        publicKey - The RSA public key provided by the CAS Server to be used for encryption. Note: Multiple instances can be constructed.

    • Method Detail

      • setUserPassword

        public String setUserPassword(String userName,
                              byte[] password,
                              byte[] salt)
                       throws CasException
        Generates the encrypted data to set the user's password. The password provided will be hashed and then encrypted with the RSA public key. Prerequisites on CAS server: The user's status must be active and must not have a password already set. The user must be linked to a token that is in the active state.
        Parameters:
        userName - user ID
        password - The password to set as a UTF-8 bytes data representation.
        salt - A salt to use as a UTF-8 bytes data representation.
        Returns:
        encryptedPassword
        Throws:
        CasException - An error of type CasException

      • authenticate

        public String authenticate(String userName,
                           byte[] password,
                           byte[] salt)
                    throws CasException
        Generates the encrypted data to authenticate the current user. The password provided will be hashed and then encrypted with the RSA public key. Prerequisites on CAS server: The user's status must be active and the user must already have a password set.
        Parameters:
        userName - userId
        password - The password to set as a UTF-8 bytes data representation.
        salt - A salt to use as a UTF-8 bytes data representation.
        Returns:
        encryptedPassword
        Throws:
        CasException - An error of type CasException

      • changeUserPassword

        public String changeUserPassword(String userName,
                                 byte[] oldPassword,
                                 byte[] newPassword,
                                 byte[] salt)
                          throws CasException
        Generates the encrypted data to change the user's password. The password provided will be hashed and then encrypted with the RSA public key. Prerequisites on CAS server: The user's status must be active and the user must already have a password set.*
        Parameters:
        userName - userId
        oldPassword - The user's existing password as a UTF-8 bytes data representation.
        newPassword - The password to set as a UTF-8 bytes data representation.
        salt - A salt to use as a UTF-8 bytes data representation.
        Returns:
        encryptedPassword
        Throws:
        CasException - An error of type CasException
